name: underscript
description: Script for Undercards. An undertale fan-made game.
author: Alan H (feildmaster) <underscript@feildmaster.com> (https://feildmaster.com/)

scripts.nextpatch: npm version prepatch --m"chore(%s): Build test patch"
scripts.prep: npm version preminor --preid= --m="chore(%s): Prep for next release"
scripts.next: npm version prerelease --m="chore(%s): Build test script"
